snippet: Eritrea’s government has jailed about 10,000 dissidents without charge or trial over the years, Amnesty International reported Thursday.
abstract: Amnest International reports that Eritrea’s government has jailed about 10,000 dissidents without charge or trial, calling it one of world's most repressive states.
lead_paragraph: Eritrea’s government has jailed about 10,000 dissidents without charge or trial over the years, Amnesty International reported Thursday.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
